active_alerts.title: Schedule Changes!
active_alerts.message: Due to larger-than-expected attendance at DevFest, the location for our weekday workshops is currently in flux. Please check back here and on Twitter for location updates.

inactive_alerts.title: Schedule Change!
inactive_alerts.message: Our Wednesday Workshop has been moved. It is now in Mudd 833, from 8-10pm.
